    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:13.519

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:18.839
    | text      = What we have today is an interview that Carrie did,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:22.639
    | text      = her most recent episode, where she was talking
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:24.800
    | text      = to a super soldier by the name of Anthony Zender.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:28.100
    | text      = This is his third time being interviewed on the show,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:30.759
    | text      = and I want to make something abundantly clear
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:32.480
    | text      = before we begin.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:33.360
    | text      = It's Anthony Zender's game.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:34.879
    | text      = That's what we're, what?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:36.399
    | text      = I know Alex has some thoughts about Zender's game.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:39.200
    | text      = No, one thing I want to make clear before we get going
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:41.679
    | text      = is that I don't want to make fun of Anthony himself.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:44.639
    | text      = I don't know what he's dealing with.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:48.360
    | text      = From listening to his first interview with Carrie,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:50.639
    | text      = there was some discussion of him being in Iraq
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:54.240
    | text      = and the possibility of some PTSD type situations.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:58.120
    | text      = So, I don't want to sit here and beat up on him,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:00.679
    | text      = and I'm not going to.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:02.120
    | text      = And I honestly probably wouldn't cover this too much
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:05.039
    | text      = if it weren't for the way that it's being used.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:09.559
    | text      = The information that he's presenting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:12.240
    | text      = and Carrie is allowing to be presented
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:15.200
    | text      = is stuff that deserves to be talked about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:18.600
    | text      = And I think this is just on the other line of my,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:23.120
    | text      = I'm going to leave this alone,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:24.159
    | text      = because it doesn't seem like he's struggling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:26.440
    | text      = I don't know what is going on in his world,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:29.759
    | text      = but he doesn't seem like some of these people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:32.360
    | text      = on Project Camelot that I'd be like,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:33.679
    | text      = I'm not even touching this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:35.519
    | text      = I still have a lot of empathy for him,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:37.440
    | text      = and I would prefer to err on the side
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:41.200
    | text      = of not beating up on him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:42.799
    | text      = For sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:43.639
    | text      = But that doesn't mean that this interview itself
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:46.639
    | text      = is necessarily off limits.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:48.360
    | text      = There's some teachable moments
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:50.039
    | text      = and some things to be learned through it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:52.360
    | text      = Generally speaking, if somebody with PTSD
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:54.600
    | text      = is saying something along those lines,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:58.320
    | text      = I view it less as them and more as a complete failure
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:01.039

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:03.200
    | text      = to kind of process this stuff.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:05.279

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:07.360
    | text      = Yeah, so as far as that goes,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:09.600
    | text      = it's a failure of the entire system
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:12.480
    | text      = that I am interested in, not him particularly.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:16.200
    | text      = Right, and he doesn't seem to be somebody,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:18.960

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:21.799

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:29.240
    | text      = So I don't have any vested desire
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:32.879
    | text      = to knock him down a page or anything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:36.039
    | text      = But simultaneously, he's presenting himself now

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 00:10:38.519

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:44.120

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 00:10:50.440
    | text      = Yeah, so we're gonna talk about this

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:54.240
    | text      = and we'll try and walk that line as best we can.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
